mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`AUTHCODE`, t1.`AUTHTIME`, t1.`DOMAIN`, t1.`IPADDR`, t1.`LOGID`, t1.`MACADDR`, t1.`PERSONNAME`, t1.`USERAGENT`, t1.`USERNAME` FROM `IBZAUTHLOG` t1 ) t1 where logid=#{id}
select t1.* from (SELECT t1.AUTHCODE, t1.AUTHTIME, t1.DOMAIN, t1.IPADDR, t1.LOGID, t1.MACADDR, t1.PERSONNAME, t1.USERAGENT, t1.USERNAME FROM IBZAUTHLOG t1 ) t1 where logid=#{id}
select t1.* from (SELECT t1.AUTHCODE, t1.AUTHTIME, t1.DOMAIN, t1.IPADDR, t1.LOGID, t1.MACADDR, t1.PERSONNAME, t1.USERAGENT, t1.USERNAME FROM IBZAUTHLOG t1 ) t1 where logid=#{id}
